Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("Code Access Security is not supported or honored by the runtime.", DiagnosticId="SYSLIB0003", UrlFormat="https://aka.ms/dotnet-warnings/{0}")]
[<System.Obsolete("Code Access Security is not supported or honored by the runtime.", DiagnosticId="SYSLIB0003", UrlFormat="https://aka.ms/dotnet-warnings/{0}")>]

summary.span: 控制文件和文件夹的访问权限。

span.span: Controls the ability to access files and folders.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此权限可区分提供的以下四种文件 IO 访问类型 ：This permission distinguishes between the following four types of file IO access provided by : - `Read`：读取对文件内容的访问权限，或访问有关文件的信息，如其长度或上次修改时间。`Read`: Read access to the contents of the file or access to information about the file, such as its length or last modification time. - `Write`：写入对文件内容的访问权限，或访问以更改有关文件的信息，如文件的名称。`Write`: Write access to the contents of the file or access to change information about the file, such as its name. 还允许删除和覆盖。Also allows for deletion and overwriting. - `Append`：仅能写入文件尾。`Append`: Ability to write to the end of a file only. 不能读取。No ability to read. - `PathDiscovery`：访问路径本身中的信息。`PathDiscovery`: Access to the information in the path itself. 这有助于保护路径中的敏感信息，例如用户名，以及有关路径中显示的目录结构的信息。This helps protect sensitive information in the path, such as user names, as well as information about the directory structure that is revealed in the path. 此值不授予对路径所指代的文件或文件夹的访问权限。This value does not grant access to files or folders represented by the path. > [!NOTE] > 授予对 程序集的访问权限类似于向其授予完全信任。Giving access to an assembly is similar to granting it full trust. 如果应用程序不应写入文件系统，则它不应具有 访问权限。If an application should not write to the file system, it should not have access. 所有这些权限都是独立的，这意味着对某个权限的权限不表示对另一个权限的权限。All these permissions are independent, meaning that rights to one do not imply rights to another. 例如， `Write` 权限不表示对或的权限 `Read` `Append` 。For example, `Write` permission does not imply permission to `Read` or `Append`. 如果需要多个权限，可以使用按位 "或" 将其组合起来，如下面的代码示例中所示。If more than one permission is desired, they can be combined using a bitwise OR as shown in the code example that follows. 文件权限根据规范绝对路径进行定义;应始终通过规范文件路径发出调用。File permission is defined in terms of canonical absolute paths; calls should always be made with canonical file paths. 描述对文件和文件夹的受保护操作。 describes protected operations on files and folders. 类可帮助提供对文件和文件夹的安全访问。The class helps provide secure access to files and folders. 当创建文件的句柄时，将执行安全访问检查。The security access check is performed when the handle to the file is created. 通过在创建时进行检查，最小化安全检查对性能的影响。By doing the check at creation time, the performance impact of the security check is minimized. 打开文件只发生一次，而读取和写入可以发生多次。Opening a file happens once, while reading and writing can happen multiple times. 打开该文件后，不进行进一步检查。Once the file is opened, no further checks are done. 如果对象被传递给不受信任的调用方，则可能会被误用。If the object is passed to an untrusted caller, it can be misused. 例如，文件句柄不应存储在公共全局静态静态位置，而具有较少权限的代码可以访问这些静态静态。For example, file handles should not be stored in public global statics where code with less permission can access them. 指定可对文件或文件夹执行的操作。 specifies actions that can be performed on the file or folder. 此外，可以使用按位 "或" 构成复杂的实例来合并这些操作。In addition, these actions can be combined using a bitwise OR to form complex instances. 对文件夹的访问权限意味着可以访问其包含的所有文件，以及访问其子文件夹中的所有文件和文件夹。Access to a folder implies access to all the files it contains, as well as access to all the files and folders in its subfolders. 例如， `Read` 访问 C:\folder1\ 意味着 `Read` 访问 C:\folder1\file1.txt、C:\folder1\folder2 \\ 、C:\folder1\folder2\file2.txt 等。For example, `Read` access to C:\folder1\ implies `Read` access to C:\folder1\file1.txt, C:\folder1\folder2\\, C:\folder1\folder2\file2.txt, and so on. > [!NOTE] > 在之前 .NET Framework 版本中 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] ，你可以使用 方法来防止无意中通过受信任代码访问系统资源。In versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you could use the method to prevent inadvertent access to system resources by trusted code. 现已过时，并且现在仅由为程序集授予的权限集确定对资源的访问权限。 is now obsolete, and access to resources is now determined solely by the granted permission set for an assembly. 若要限制对文件的访问，必须在沙盒中运行部分受信任的代码，并仅向该代码允许访问的资源分配权限。To limit access to files, you must run partially trusted code in a sandbox and assign it permissions only to resources that the code is allowed to access. 有关在沙盒中运行应用程序的信息，请参阅 [如何：在沙盒中运行部分受信任的代码](/dotnet/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox)。For information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](/dotnet/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox). ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用的代码 。The following examples illustrate code that uses . 在以下两行代码之后，对象 `f` 表示读取客户端计算机本地磁盘上的所有文件的权限。After the following two lines of code, the object `f` represents permission to read all files on the client computer's local disks. 然后，该代码示例要求权限来确定应用程序是否有权读取文件。The code example then demands the permission to determine whether the application has permission to read the files. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 在以下两行代码之后，对象 `f2` 表示读取 c：\ test_r 和读取和写入 C:\example\out.txt 的权限。After the following two lines of code, the object `f2` represents permissions to read C:\test_r and read and write to C:\example\out.txt. `Read` 和 `Write` 表示前面所述的文件/文件夹权限。`Read` and `Write` represent the file/folder permissions as previously described. 创建权限后，代码需要权限来确定应用程序是否具有读取和写入文件的权限。After creating the permission, the code demands the permission to determine whether the application has the right to read and write to the file. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermission Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数只允许为 指定的文件或目录指定其中一个值。This constructor allows only one of the values to be specified for the specified file or directory. 使用 方法定义复杂的权限。Use the method to define complex permissions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 如何使用构造函数创建类的新实例 ，该类提供对 c：\ test_r 文件的完全访问权限。The following code example shows the use of the constructor to create a new instance of the class, which provides complete access to the C:\test_r file. summary.span: 使用对指定文件或目录的指定访问权限和对文件控制信息的指定访问权限初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified access to the designated file or directory and the specified access rights to file control information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数只允许为指定的一个 或多个指定的文件指定一个值。This constructor allows only one value to be specified for the specified file or directories. 使用 方法定义复杂的权限。Use the method to define complex permissions. `control`参数指定是否 `path` 可以更改、查看或不能访问为指定的文件或目录 (ACL) 的访问控制列表。The `control` parameter specifies whether the access control list (ACL) for the file or directory specified by `path` can be changed, viewed, or cannot be accessed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 访问控制列表 (ACL) 介绍对给定文件及其属性具有或没有特定操作权限的个人或组。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file and its properties. 更改或查看 ACL 的功能是一个重要的权限，应小心授予。The ability to change or view an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数只允许为 指定的文件和目录指定一个值。This constructor allows only one value to be specified for the specified files and directories. 使用 方法定义复杂的权限。Use the method to define complex permissions. `control`参数指定是否 `path` 可以更改、查看或不能访问为指定的文件或目录 (ACL) 的访问控制列表。The `control` parameter specifies whether the access control list (ACL) for the file or directory specified by `path` can be changed, viewed, or cannot be accessed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 访问控制列表 (ACL) 介绍对给定文件及其属性具有或没有特定操作权限的个人或组。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file and its properties. 更改或查看 ACL 的功能是一个重要的权限，应小心授予。The ability to change or view an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess AllFiles { System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess get(); void set(System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置对所有文件的允许访问权限。

span.span: Gets or sets the permitted access to all files.

value.span: 所有文件的文件 I/O 标志集合。

span.span: The set of file I/O flags for all files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置对本地计算机和网络驱动器上的所有文件的允许访问权限。This property gets or sets the permitted access to all files on the local computer and network drives. 可以使用按位 "与" 运算检查单个值。An individual value can be checked for using a bitwise AND operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法 。The following code example shows the use of the property. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermission Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/VB/source.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess AllLocalFiles { System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess get(); void set(System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置对所有本地文件的允许访问权限。

span.span: Gets or sets the permitted access to all local files.

value.span: 所有本地文件的文件 I/O 标志集合。

span.span: The set of file I/O flags for all local files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本地文件是包含在本地计算机上的文件。Local files are files contained on the local computer. 不通过网络驱动器访问的任何文件均为本地文件。Any files not accessed through a network drive are local files. 可以使用按位 "与" 运算检查单个值。An individual value can be checked for using a bitwise AND operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法 。The following code example shows the use of the property. summary.span: 创建并返回当前权限的相同副本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限的副本表示对资源的相同访问权限。A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.

Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: 获取 对象的哈希代码，此代码适合在哈希算法和数据结构（例如哈希表）中使用。

span.span: Gets a hash code for the object that is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.

returns.span: 当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: A hash code for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同一权限的两个实例的哈希代码可能不同，因此，不应使用哈希代码来比较两个 对象。The hash code for two instances of the same permission might be different, hence a hash code should not be used to compare two objects.

summary.span: 使用指定的 权限获取所有文件和目录。

span.span: Gets all files and directories with the specified .

returns.span: 一个数组，此数组包含了一组文件和文件夹的路径，所赋予的对这些文件和文件夹的访问权限由 参数指定。

span.span: An array containing the paths of the files and directories to which access specified by the parameter is granted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以获取当前权限的状态。Use this method to get the state of the current permission. 若要获取 `Read` 和访问的状态 `Write` ，需要对此方法进行两次调用。To get the state of both `Read` and `Write` access, two calls to this method are required. > [!NOTE] > `access`参数限制为的值 ，这些值表示一种类型的文件访问。The `access` parameter is limited to the values of , which represent single types of file access. 这些值为 、 、 和 。Those values are , , , and . 可接受的值 `access` 不包括 和 ，它们不表示单一类型的文件访问。The values acceptable to `access` do not include and , which do not represent single types of file access. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的用法 。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission/CPP/fileiopermission.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission/CS/fileiopermission.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission/VB/fileiopermission.vb#7)]

span.span: is , which represents more than one type of file access, or , which does not represent any type of file access.

param.span: 要与当前权限相交的权限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

span.span: It must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的交集。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示当前权限和指定权限的交集的一个新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集为空，则此新权限为 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限的交集是描述它们共同描述的一组操作的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有同时传递两个原始权限的请求才会传递交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.

exception.span: 参数不为 ，并且与当前权限不属于同一类型。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: This permission must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定了指定权限所包含的一组操作，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示对 C:\example.txt 的读取访问权限的权限是表示对 C：的读取访问权限的权限的子集 \\ 。For example, a permission that represents read access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents read access to C:\\. 如果此方法返回 `true` ，则当前权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限比指定权限更多。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.

exception.span: 参数不为 ，并且与当前权限不属于同一类型。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

abstract member IsUnrestricted : unit -> bool override this.IsUnrestricted : unit -> bool

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示当前权限是否不受限制。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.

returns.span: 如果当前权限不受限制，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无限制的权限表示对受权限保护的所有资源的访问权限。An unrestricted permission represents access to all resources protected by the permission.

summary.span: 设置指定文件和目录的特定访问权限，以替换现有的权限状态。

span.span: Sets the specified access to the specified files and directories, replacing the existing state of the permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定访问类型的当前权限的以前状态被覆盖。The previous state of the current permission for the specified access type is overwritten. 下面的代码将 C：\temp 的访问设置为 。The following code sets the access for C:\temp to . Public Overrides Function Union (other As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: other
param.span: 与当前权限合并的权限。

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的并集。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用的结果 是一个权限，它表示当前权限和指定权限所表示的所有操作。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何传递任意权限的需求都将传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
